articles.author: yyctrader
articles.description: Sepolia is the second of three testnets to merge their proof-of-work (PoW) execution layers with their PoS consensus layers before the upgrade can take effect on Ethereum’s mainnet.
articles.title: Ethereum Closes In On Proof-of-Stake After Sepolia Testnet Merge The Sepolia testnet activated PoS consensus on Wednesday at block number 1,450,409.
